# Battle of Mesembria

| combatant1        =  First Bulgarian Empire
| combatant2        =
| commander1        =  Unknown
| commander2        =  Leo V
| strength1         = Unknown
| strength2         = Unknown
| casualties1       = Very heavy
| casualties2       = Light|
}}
The Battle of Mesambria was a battle between the Byzantines and the Bulgarians during the war of Khan Krum. In this battle, during the night attack, the Byzantines under the command of their Emperor Leo V almost completely defeated the Bulgarians.
Sources
*
* Wasilewski T. [https://archive.org/details/historiabugarii0000wasi/page/48/mode/2up Historia Bułgarii.] — Wrocław: Ossolineum, 1983, p. 49. — ISBN 83-0402466-7
* [https://ru.m.wikisource.org/wiki/%D0%92%D0%AD/%D0%92%D0%A2/%D0%93%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BA%D0%BE-%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B5_%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B9%D0%BD%D1%8B Грего-Болгарские войны] Sytin Military encyclopedia
